question: Punjala Shiva Shankar, who passed away recently, was related to which field?
explanation: Punjala Shiv Shankar (87), an Indian politician, has recently passed away in Hyderabad. He served as the Minister of External Affairs (MEA), Law and Petroleum. He was a very influential minister in Indira Gandhi\'s and Rajiv Gandhi\'s cabinets and is one of the most senior politicians in India. He also served as the Governor of Sikkim and Kerala.
